name.description: The name of the buyer as shown in the invoice.

email.description: The email of the buyer as shown in the invoice.

name.description: The name of the seller as shown in the invoice.

type.description: Transaction type, inferred from 'Gas Purchases' (Buy) or 'Gas Sales' (Sell).

deal_id.description: The deal ID of the transaction. Repeat the deal ID for every daily line item under that deal.

location.description: The location of the transaction. Repeat the same location for every daily line item under the same deal.

date.description: The specific daily transaction date. Every row with a date must be extracted, even if multiple rows exist for the same deal.

price.description: The price per unit ($/MMBtu) for that daily row.

volume.description: The daily transaction volume (MMBtu), not deal totals. Preserve the sign as it appears, whether positive or negative.

amount.description: The daily transaction amount in dollars, not roll-up totals. Preserve the sign as it appears, whether positive or negative.

invoice_date.description: The date when the invoice was issued.

due_date.description: The due date of the invoice.

invoice_total.description: The total amount due for the invoice. It is negative if enclosed in parenthesis.

bank_name.description: The name of the bank for wire instructions.
